name: NETXP LINUX KExec Usage - attempt to load new kernel
description: Rule monitors the usage of the kexec_load syscall, which is associated with the KExec mechanism for loading a new kernel from the currently running kernel. This helps in tracking any actions related to kernel execution.
author: Szymon Gluch
query:
//any where auditd.log.key: "*KEXEC*" and
any where event.module: "auditd"
